allow:

Add comprehensive security hardening and complete application implementation

Security Fixes:
- Add .gitignore to prevent credential exposure (.env, __pycache__, etc.)

- Strengthen password validation (uppercase, lowercase, digit, special char, common password check)
- Fix CORS configuration with restricted methods and headers
- Fix timing attack prevention with real bcrypt dummy hash
- Fix email enumeration (generic error messages)
- Add security headers middleware (X-Content-Type-Options, X-Frame-Options, CSP, HSTS, etc.)
- Add distributed locking to prevent race conditions in state store
- Tighten rate limits on auth endpoints (3-10 requests/hour)
- Fix Redis connection pool cleanup

Code Quality:
- Add timezone-aware datetime utilities (utc_now, ensure_utc)
- Extract magic numbers to centralized constants module
- Standardize error handling with LearnerException hierarchy
- Enhance request ID tracing (accept incoming X-Request-ID headers)

- Complete agent orchestration system with menu option routing
- Add MenuOption dataclass for proper numeric input handling
- Implement all learning agents (Coach, Curriculum, Socratic, Assessment, Scout, DrillSergeant)
- Add session management with planning and activity tracking
- Add content ingestion with multiple source adapters
- Add vector search and embeddings support

EOF
